game.name: Highway Drifter: Hajwala Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Get ready for an exciting adventure on the desert road! Our game is where sand intersects with asphalt, and speed meets with thrill. Stir up the sands and let the desert winds guide your drift. Are you ready to dive into desert road drifting?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Get ready for an exciting adventure on the desert road! Our game is where sand intersects with asphalt, and speed meets with thrill. Stir up the sands and let the desert winds guide your drift. Are you ready to dive into desert road drifting?
